article.headline: Cent. Connecticut St. 89, UMBC 86
article.story: NEW BRITAIN, Conn. -- Robby Ptacek scored 23 points and Central Connecticut State defeated Maryland-Baltimore County 89-86 in double overtime on Wednesday night. Central Connecticut State trailed 82-80 with 2:36 to go in the final overtime before pulling away with seven straight points. Rosario put the Blue Devils ahead and started the run on 3-pointer with 2:11 remaining. Vince Rosario scored 14 points, David Simmons 13 and Shemik Thompson 12 for the Blue Devils (4-7), who improved to 2-0 in overtime games this season. They defeated Albany 70-68 in OT on Dec. 12. The Blue Devils have won 20 straight when scoring at least 80 points. Chris De La Rosa scored 25 points and Robbie Jackson had 24 points and 15 rebounds for the Retrievers (1-11). UMBC's Chauncey Gilliam, who finished with 12 points, tied the game at 66-66 on a layup with 38 seconds left in regulation.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
